# Retribution (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers (Su):** Once per day, if you have been harmed by someone in combat, you can make a strike of vengeance with a melee or ranged weapon against that foe on your next action. If this strike hits, you deal maximum damage.

**Retribution Domain Spells**

**1 [[Shield of Faith (Spell)|Shield of Faith]]:** Aura grants +2 or higher deflection bonus.

**2 [[Bear's Endurance (Spell)|Bear’s Endurance]]:** Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 minute/level.

**3 [[Speak with Dead (Spell)|Speak with Dead]]:** Corpse answers one question/2 levels.

**4 [[Fire Shield (Spell)|Fire Shield]]:** Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you’re protected from heat or cold.

**5 [[Mark of Justice (Spell)|Mark of Justice]]:** Designates action that will trigger curse on subject.

**6 [[Banishment (Spell)|Banishment]]:** Banishes 2 HD/level of extraplanar creatures.

**7 [[Spell Turning]]:** Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.

**8 [[Discern Location (Spell)|Discern Location]]:** Reveals exact location of creature or object.

**9 [[Storm of Vengeance (Spell)|Storm of Vengeance]]:** Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.
